CustomField.formula: IF( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_8_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_8_2__c))) ), MAX( VALUE(TEXT(Score_8_1__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_8_2__c)) ), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total score from the Need section. Only calculated where all scores are completed.
CustomField.label: Need Score
